               'discovered in the Any23 StreamUtils.java file and is known to '
               'affect Any23 versions < 2.5. XML external entity injection '
               '(also known as XXE) is a web security vulnerability that '
               "allows an attacker to interfere with an application's "
               'processing of XML data. It often allows an attacker to view '
               'files on the application server filesystem, and to interact '
               'with any back-end or external systems that the application '
